title: 133: What scouts look for, turning around careers
itunes:title: 133: What scouts look for, turning around careers
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks discuss which players are turning around their careers after trying rookie seasons. The duo also discuss what aspiring scouts can do when breaking down film and building player reports. Also, which teams are for real, and what's the secret for success at the cornerback position?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
